name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: QLED Curved Monitor
description: 49-inch ultrawide 144Hz curved gaming monitor with Quantum Dot technology, 1ms response time, and stunning HDR support for an immersive battlefield.

name: Foldable Smartphone
description: Innovative folding phone with a seamless dual-screen display, powerful Tensor chip, and a revolutionary multi-tasking experience.

name: Creator Ultrabook
description: Slim and lightweight laptop designed for creative professionals, featuring a vibrant touch display, dedicated GPU, and long-lasting battery life.

name: Studio Microphones
description: Professional-grade USB condenser microphone with four pattern settings (Cardioid, Omnidirectional, Bidirectional, Stereo) for podcasting and streaming.

name: Rugged Outdoor Watch
description: GPS smartwatch built to military standards for thermal, shock, and water resistance, complete with tactical and navigation features.
